results.title: Effects of chronic treatment with lisinopril on cardiovascular complications in streptozotocin diabetic and DOCA hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: Treatment of @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (1 mg kg-1, p.o. daily for six weeks), in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ animals prevented @CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@STZ@@@ induced @DISEASE_Body_Weight @DISEASE_MESH:D001835 @@@loss of body weight@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, @DISEASE_Bradycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D001919 @@@bradycardia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypothyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@hypothyroidism@@@.

citations.NLM: Sevak AR, Goyal RK. Effects of chronic treatment with lisinopril on cardiovascular complications in streptozotocin diabetic and DOCA hypertensive rats. Pharmacol Res. 1996 Nov-Dec;34(5-6):201-9. PMID: 9076844
citations.BibTeX: @article{9076844, title={Effects of chronic treatment with lisinopril on cardiovascular complications in streptozotocin diabetic and DOCA hypertensive rats.}, author={Sevak AR and Goyal RK}, journal={Pharmacol Res}, volume={34}, number={5-6}, pages={201-9}}

results.title: Probable interaction between warfarin and bee pollen.
results.text_hl: His medical history included @DISEASE_Atrial_Flutter @DISEASE_MESH:D001282 @@@atrial flutter@@@, @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@, @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@, @DISEASE_Erectile_Dysfunction @DISEASE_MESH:D007172 @@@erectile dysfunction@@@, @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Hypothyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@hypothyroidism@@@. His medication regimen included @CHEMICAL_Warfarin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014859 @@@warfarin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@hydrochlorothiazide@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Thyroxine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013974 @@@levothyroxine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Glyburide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005905 @@@glyburide@@@, @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Vardenafil_Dihydrochloride @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069058 @@@vardenafil@@@, @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@, a multivitamin, and the herbal products Cataplex E2, Cataplex B, and Cyruta.

citations.NLM: Hurren KM, Lewis CL. Probable interaction between warfarin and bee pollen. Am J Health Syst Pharm. 2010 Dec 1;67(23):2034-7. PMID: 21098375
citations.BibTeX: @article{21098375, title={Probable interaction between warfarin and bee pollen.}, author={Hurren KM and Lewis CL}, journal={Am J Health Syst Pharm}, volume={67}, number={23}, pages={2034-7}}
